name: Business Open Hours Master
author: iCanWP Team, Sean Roh, Chris Couweleers

sections.description:
Business Open Hours Master is designed with a very simple interface so anyone with or without coding experience can easily configure, display, and make updates to the business hours.
Instead of listing a full day of the week and the hours, it is displayed based on the type of hours with the custom title for each period.

Uninstall

  • All saved options will be deleted from the database. Use disable plugin if you are going to use the plugin again.

Support

  • This plugin is provided as is without any warranty.
  • All supports maybe available voluntarily by the development team.
  • Any suggestions, complaints, support requests are happily accepted via email at support@icanwp.com

Limitation

  • You can only have one Open Hours display per page.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload ‘business-open-hours-master’ directory to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use shortcode ‘[show-business-hours]’ in posts or pages.
  4. Find ‘Business Opening Hours’ under your available widgets, then simply drag and drop it into a widget area.

Please see the detailed screenshots and guide in the plugin settings or from our website https://icanwp.com/plugins/business-open-hours-master/
sections.faq:
1. Does it work on mobile setting?
    Yes.

  2. Does it work in the widget area?
    Yes.

  3. Is this slider compatible with other major plugins?
    Yes, this the Background Slider Master is compatible with the following major plugins:

– WooCommerce
– Gravity Forms
– WPTouch Pro
– Jetpack
– Many more

short_description: Creates an easy to manage list of open and closing business hours.
